boat.name: Wren
boat.full_description:
19' design for home building by Francois Vivier. Designed with raids in mind it has 230 sq ft (21.3 square metres) of sail area and is quite flat bottomed compared to Francois' other designs as well as having a beefy 125kg cast iron centreboard. We have rowed it but is certainly happier at the sail end of the sail and oar conundrum. 

The third boat that I have built, it took me a little over two years to complete.

Mine is sail number 4, the others have been built in France as far as I know, There is also one under construction in Australia

Mine lives on the trailer most of the time, I can launch and retrieve single handed in most conditions.

There is an option for symetrical or asymmetrical spinnakers included in the plans. I have had an asymmetric spinnaker made and intend to get it rigged up over the winter for a first go summer 2020.
boat.short_description: 19' half decked boat designed by Francois Vivier. Home built.
